thread.title: Fayose: "I'm the Rock, nobody can arrest me," Governor boasts
thread.title_full: Fayose: "I'm the Rock, nobody can arrest me," Governor boasts

author: Goodness Adaoyiche
title: Fayose: "I'm the Rock, nobody can arrest me," Governor boasts
text:
Ayo Fayose has dismissed claims that he may be arrested after his tenure as governor of Ekiti state. Governor Fayose consistently opposes President Muhammadu Buhari 's policies and the All Progressives Congress -led federal government. Despite all comments and criticisms , Fayose enjoys immunity as a sitting governor; this protects him from arrest and prosecution. 
Governor Ayo Fayose in China (Twitter) Referring to himself as " The Rock " , Governor Fayose says anybody who plans to arrest him after his tenure will not be in power. "May I tell you that anybody that waits for me negatively to complete my tenure would not be in the office at the time," Fayose said in an interview with Punch on Saturday, February 4, 2017. He is not done yet... "Anybody waiting for my downfall would be swimming in more troubles that time. My name is Peter ‘The Rock’. The man God promised he would build Ekiti and Nigeria on his shoulder. 
Governor Ayo Fayose rides on okada to inspect projects (Twitter) "Watch the turn of events. Some people say it is because I enjoy immunity. Don’t other governors enjoy immunity? It is dependent on who you are. They plotted to manipulate the judiciary against me, it didn’t work. The House of Assembly dominated by the All Progressives Congress members attempted to remove me, it didn’t work. "The God that put me here does not sleep nor slumber. The God would not allow me to fall into the traps of my enemies. "Many things would happen in this country that would amaze Nigerians," he added. Governor Fayose recently declared support for 2Face Idibia's February 6 anti-government protest. Tweet Author
